It's also wise to ensure you have your feed icon showing on all pages within your blog in that same location. People will spend a lot of time searching for content that offers them value as well as being timely. focus on writing great content that offers some real value to your readers. then they won't hesitate on recommending it to their friends either - so value is the key to success here.
